txt.en: You should return to the entrance of the ruin.
A grim darkness rises in the ruins of Gorthad. You were asked to set forth and discover what evil stirs in the accursed ruins.
Return to the entrance of the ruins
'This bodes ill, [placeholder]. We should return to our settlement and inform the others. If gaunt-men be about, then trouble is surely brewing in these lands.'
Discover the evil within the ruins and destroy it.
Discover and destroy the source of evil in the ruins
The terror wrought by the gaunt-man in these ruins is ended
